title: Radisson Hotel Group unveils its new Radisson Blu Resort in Rajasthan
description: The Radisson Hotel Group has expanded its portfolio in India with the opening of the Radisson Blu Resort located in Kumbhalgarh, Rajasthan. The hotel, which is situated near UNESCO World Heritage Kumbhalgarh Fort, is the only Indian Green Building Council-certified property in the region. Guests can access the property via Maharana Pratap Airport in Udaipur and Udaipur City Junction Train Station.
